channel.title: Server won't launch
channel.description:
i receive this error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:397) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:113)
[/code] here is my line 113 in server java [code] public static ItemHandler itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); [/code] itemhanderler.java line 397 [code]if (token3[(6 + i)] != null) { [/code] itemhandler.java line 33 [code] loadItemList("item.cfg");[/code]

item.title: Server won't launch
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The error is because you have extra values in your item.cfg that shouldn’t be there. So when the server tries parsing the file, it causes an out of bounds exception.
look into your item.cfg and fix the items you recently changed or whatever…
If you absolutely cannot find the issue, you can change the your servers item defs from the cfg to a json using a tutorial (stats/data may be lost).

Read full topic
